titleStmt.title: A delectable new ballad, intituled Leader-haughs and yarow. To its own proper tune.
titleStmt.author: Burne, Nicol.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Nicol Burne by Wing.
Verse: "When Phoebus bright the azure skies ..."
Includes: The vvords of Burn the violer.
Item at A5:2[442] imperfect: trimmed and heavily stained.
Item at A6:1 [436], Rox.III.725 imperfect: mutilated, affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
